title: The Mark of the Demons
description: Tandem, 1976. Mass market paperback, 2nd printing. This book was first published in 1969. Sword & sorcery. "Brak" is a blond warrior forced to battle the evil that thwarts his destiny, He must combat sorcery and plagues as he journeys south to Khurdisan. Before reaching this paradise city, he must hack his way through obstacle after obstacle as he passes through unknown lands.  This is the third in a series of four books. The volumes  Vol. 1: "Brak the Barbarian" (1968)  Vol. 2: "Brak the Barbarian Versus the Sorceress" (1969)  Vol. 3: "Brak the Barbarian Versus the Mark of the Demons" (1969)  Vol. 4: "When the Idols Walked" (1978)
author: John Jakes
